Meteor - Windows update cannot convert null to object

23 Jul 2015

Cannot Convert Null To Object

While attempting to update one of my meteor projects on my windows box, I ran into the following error:

Attempting to update the meteor binary through meteor update yielded the same error.

How to Fix

In order to fix the error, I actually had to completely uninstall meteor and reinstall from https://win.meteor.com/. After everything was installed, meteor update worked fine. Hope this helps anyone encountering the same problem!
